amendment.description: To prioritize patient care over administrative overhead.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 4035 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 4035 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 3899. (consideration: CR S996-1004, S1040) To prioritize patient care over administrative overhead.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4035 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 3899.
